Author: sneeakyraccoon
Text: Whenever I’m looking for something to eat at work, I always ask myself if I can “afford” the calories, or how many calories something “costs”

Author: nofreepizza
Text: I kinda have this, but only with food. Nowadays when I think of how expensive a food is it's not because of how much it is price-wise, but how many calories it would 'cost' me if I ate it.
